entry.title: Sunday: Light snow. High minus 29.
entry.summary: Light snow ending this afternoon then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 29. Wind chill minus 44 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022

entry.title: Sunday night: Light snow. Low minus 32.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Light snow beginning before morning. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 35 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Sunday 25 December 2022
